article:
Hello, everyone! Come and have a look at our Dessert House ! Would you like  to eat  dessert? Do you enjoy eating with your friends? I have a good place to  _  you.
Dessert House is not big,  _  it is a great place. There are six waiters in it. They're friendly. The chair and tables there are  _  green. The color makes people hungry . You can  listen to  music when you're eating in Dessert House.  _  you don't like to eat dessert, you can eat some other food like dumplings, noodles , soup and so on  .
There is a great  _  every day at Dessert House, sometimes fruit ice creams with apples or strawberries, sometimes other dessert. Special fruit ice cream is only 1.00 yuan  _  two. Also, they put a small  _  in some ice creams. If you have this kind of dumpling ice cream, you can get a free ice cream. It's very  _ .
